name: Glyph Hunter: 3D
description:
Welcome To Glyph Hunter : 3D

Play as a Seer from the cult of scribes and discover an ancient Egyptian mystery.

Game can be played in browser or with touch screens / phones (may have performance difficulty on devices with less than 4GB of ram).

Leave a comment if complete the puzzle and check out the design logs if you're interested :)

Support the Development for a PC download of the game. Some future updates will only take place on the downloadable version. 

CONTROLS

Use the mouse or touch to look around

Left Click to interact with highlighted elements

Press TAB key / button to access settings in game
